name: Insulin Pen
description: A pre-filled, disposable device used for administering insulin to manage blood sugar levels in diabetes.

name: Lancets
description: Small, sharp needles used with a lancing device to obtain blood samples for glucose testing.

name: Diabetic Test Strips
description: Disposable strips used in conjunction with blood glucose meters to measure blood sugar levels.

name: Diabetic Skin Creams
description: Moisturizing lotions designed to prevent dry, cracked skin, which is a common issue for diabetics.

name: Diabetic Testing Kits
description: Diabetic testing kits are comprehensive tools that allow individuals to monitor their blood glucose levels at home for effective diabetes management.

name: Diabetes-Friendly Snacks
description: Diabetes-friendly snacks are low-sugar, high-fiber foods designed to help maintain stable blood sugar levels while satisfying hunger.
